@we-need-seeds : If you downloaded an uncracked/unpatched .iso that contained a Steam Setup .exe (asks for an activation code) as well as a .sim and .sid files, you need to use Phoenix SID Unpacker (Google - latest is beta 1.4), update it, and extract the contents of the files. Then, replace those files by the ones contained in the crack.
